definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
geographic latitude (i.e. angle between the equatorial plane and the normal to the reference ellipsoid)

sentences.english: The geographical field exercitation is an important part of the geographical teaching process in universities.
sentences.chinese: 地理野外实习是高校地理教学过程中的重要教学环节。

sentences.english: The geographical field exercitation is an important part of the geographical teaching process in universities.
sentences.chinese: 地理野外实习是高校地理教学过程中的重要教学环节。

sentences.english: Location theory is one of basic parts of economic geography.
sentences.chinese: 区位理论是现代经济地理学基本理论的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: What motivates you to connect with a brand on a location-based service?
sentences.chinese: 什么激励你去把地理位置服务和品牌联系起来？

sentences.english: Geography teaching material of Hunan version has been used by Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 浙江省采用了湘教版地理教材。

sentences.english: Li Siguang is a famous geographer.
sentences.chinese: 李四光是一位著名的地理学家。

sentences.english: With its special location of Yueyang, its dialect is very complex.
sentences.chinese: 岳阳由于其地理位置的特殊性，方言十分复杂。

sentences.english: In this paper the worldwide geographical distribution of the genus Achnatherum is discussed in detail.
sentences.chinese: 本文详细讨论了世界芨芨草属的地理分布等问题。

sentences.english: Finally, various geographic characteristic oriented knowledge rules were described.
sentences.chinese: 最后阐述各种面向地理特征的制图综合知识规则。

sentences.english: Prof, Zhu Kezhcn is both a pioneer and a founder of modern geography in China.
sentences.chinese: 竺可桢教授是中国近代科学地理学的先驱与奠基人。

sentences.english: It refers to the illusion that life will be better when we get somewhere else.
sentences.chinese: 地理疗法指的是一种错觉，即他方的生活更美好。

sentences.english: Her story and the pictures appear in the May issue of National Geographic magazine.
sentences.chinese: 国家地理杂志五月期刊登了她的故事及一些相关照片。

sentences.english: Putuo District possesses a preferable geographic location.
Spatial characteristics of tourism flow is one of the most important contents in tourism geography.
sentences.chinese: 旅游客流空间特性是旅游地理学重要研究内容之一。

sentences.english: I'm really looking forward to this trip with our geology class.
sentences.chinese: 我非常盼望着也地理课同学的这次旅行。

definition: abbr. for mathematics 數學|数学[shu4 xue2], physics 物理[wu4 li3] and chemistry 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
literature and language/(PRC) Chinese (as a school subject)
